name: DeadBus
description:
Plot twist

You control a Bus and your mission is to get to the station before BUDS catch you.

This rage game is a tribute to CrazyBus (the game with the best soundtrack).It was made for the Dos Game Jam in only 3 days. I made all the songs with Beep Box. Always remember that this game is a joke.
